role: Phase 1: Audit coderef-core package ONLY (dashboard agent handles rest of dashboard project). Report discrepancies vs CSV.

context.problem: CSV may not accurately reflect current state of ecosystem resources
context.solution: Audit coderef-core package ONLY (NOT full dashboard project) and report all discrepancies
context.impact: CSV becomes accurate single source of truth

execution_steps.step_1: READ resources/index.md to access CSV and session documents
execution_steps.step_3: SCAN coderef-core package ONLY (NOT full dashboard project) for all resources: src/, scripts/
execution_steps.step_5: DOCUMENT discrepancies (missing, outdated, incorrect) and new resources
